results.name: a(2n+1) = |a(2n) - a(2n-1)|, a(2n) = a(n) + a(n-1), a(0) = -1.
comment: a(n) = abs(t(n+1)) if n>0 where t(n) is the twisted Stern sequence defined by R. Bacher and M. Coons. - _Michael Somos_, Jan 08 2011
link: Roland Bacher, Twisting the Stern sequence, arXiv:1005.5627v1 [math.CO], 2010.
Michael Coons, On Some Conjectures concerning Stern's Sequence and its Twist, arXiv:1008.0193v3 [math.NT], 2010.
formula: G.f. A(x) satisfies: A(x) = 2*x + (1 + x + x^2) * A(x^2). - _Michael Somos_, Jan 08 2011
mathematica: a[ n_] := Which[ n < 2, Boole[n == 1] - Boole[n == 0], OddQ[n], Abs[a[n - 1] - a[n - 2]], True, a[n/2] + a[n/2 - 1]]; (* _Michael Somos_, Jul 25 2018 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = my(A, m); if( n<0, 0, m = 1; A = -1 + O(x); while( m <= n, m*=2; A = 2*x + (1 + x + x^2) * subst( A, x, x^2 ) ); polcoeff( A, n ) )}; /* _Michael Somos_, Jan 08 2011 */
